title: SAMPARC MEDICAL Hospital Website with Admin Dashboard & AI Assistant - Frontend Implementation

requirements.summary: Create professional, animated hospital website with medical theme and consistent design system
acceptanceCriteria: Hero section has animated entrance with hospital name and tagline
Smooth scroll animations on all major sections
Consistent color palette of white, teal/green, and gold used site-wide
Responsive design works on mobile, tablet, and desktop
Navigation menu has buttons: Home, About Us, Services, Medicines, Contact Us, Admin

file_operations.description: Configure custom medical theme colors (teal/green primary, gold accent, white background) and enable animation utilities for smooth scroll and entrance effects
Add global styles for smooth scroll behavior, typography system with consistent font hierarchy, and base animation keyframes for entrance effects

Create main layout component with header/navbar containing navigation buttons (Home, About Us, Services, Medicines, Contact Us, Admin), logo placement, and footer. Apply medical theme styling and responsive design
Create hero section component with animated entrance effects, hospital name, tagline, and call-to-action. Fetch hero text content from backend using getContent('hero')
Set up React Router with routes for Home (/), About Us (/about), Services (/services), Medicines (/medicines), Contact Us (/contact), and Admin (/admin). Wrap routes with Layout component

requirements.summary: Display custom generated SAMPARC MEDICAL logo in header/navbar
acceptanceCriteria: Logo is displayed in the top navigation bar
Logo includes a medical symbol and the text 'SAMPARC MEDICAL'
Logo is served from frontend/public/assets/generated

file_operations.description: Add logo image element in header/navbar referencing the generated logo at frontend/public/assets/generated/samparc-medical-logo.dim_400x120.png with appropriate sizing and alt text

requirements.summary: Create About Us section with founder and CEO professional bios
acceptanceCriteria: Section displays AMITKUMAR BANERJEE as Founder Director/Secretary with a bio
Section displays ANUJ SINGH as CEO with a bio
Both bios are professionally written and highlight their healthcare leadership
Section is visually appealing with cards or profile layout

file_operations.description: Create About Us page with leadership section featuring profile cards for AMITKUMAR BANERJEE (Founder Director/Secretary) and ANUJ SINGH (CEO). Include professional bios highlighting vision and healthcare leadership. Use generated avatar images at frontend/public/assets/generated/founder-avatar.dim_200x200.png and frontend/public/assets/generated/ceo-avatar.dim_200x200.png. Fetch about text from backend using getContent('about')
Register /about route to render About page component

requirements.summary: Create Contact section displaying hospital address, email, and multiple phone/WhatsApp numbers
acceptanceCriteria: Address is displayed correctly
Email samparc6@gmail.com is shown and clickable as mailto link
Customer care number +91 9766343454 is shown with a WhatsApp link
Cross WhatsApp +91 9270556455 is shown with a WhatsApp link
CEO contact +91 9766343456 is shown with phone and WhatsApp links
WhatsApp links open wa.me URLs in a new tab

file_operations.description: Create Contact page displaying hospital address (SAMPARC MEDICAL, Nearby Malavali Railway Station, Samparc Malavali Campus, Near Malavli, Malavli, Maharashtra 410405), email (samparc6@gmail.com) as mailto link, customer care (+91 9766343454), cross WhatsApp (+91 9270556455), and CEO contact (+91 9766343456) with wa.me WhatsApp links opening in new tabs
Register /contact route to render Contact page component

requirements.summary: Implement frontend-only AI chat assistant widget for hospital and health queries
acceptanceCriteria: Floating chat button visible on all public pages
Chat window opens with a greeting from the SAMPARC MEDICAL assistant
Handles questions about hospital location, hours, services, contact info
Displays customer care number +91 9766343454 when asked about support
Shows a message for unanswerable queries suggesting to call/WhatsApp
Chat history persists within the session

file_operations.description: Create AI chat assistant widget component with floating button (bottom-right corner), chat window UI, and local pattern-matching logic to answer hospital FAQs (location, services, contact info, hours). Store chat history in component state. Display customer care number +91 9766343454 for support queries. Include fallback message for unanswerable questions

Create scripted response patterns and knowledge base for SAMPARC MEDICAL assistant covering hospital info, services, medicines, contact details, and general health FAQs. Use keyword matching to trigger appropriate responses
Include ChatAssistant component in Layout so it appears on all public pages

requirements.summary: Create public Medicines/Pharmacy page displaying medicine catalog from backend
acceptanceCriteria: Public medicines page lists all medicines added by admin
Each medicine card shows name, description, and price
Page is responsive and styled consistently with the site theme
Medicines data is fetched from the backend canister

file_operations.description: Create public Medicines page that fetches medicine list from backend using listMedicines(), displays medicine cards with name, description, and price formatted from bigint. Apply responsive grid layout and medical theme styling
Register /medicines route to render Medicines page component

requirements.summary: Build protected Admin Dashboard with hardcoded credential login
acceptanceCriteria: Login form at /admin with email and password fields
Credentials validated against gauravsaswade2009@gmail.com / p1love2g
Invalid credentials show an error message
Valid login stores session in localStorage and redirects to /admin/dashboard
Dashboard is inaccessible without login (redirect to /admin on unauthenticated access)
Logout button clears session

file_operations.description: Create admin login page with email and password form. Validate credentials against gauravsaswade2009@gmail.com and p1love2g. On success, store auth token in localStorage and redirect to /admin/dashboard. Show error message on failure
Create authentication hook managing localStorage session state, login/logout functions, and isAuthenticated boolean flag
Create protected route wrapper component that checks authentication status using useAuth hook and redirects to /admin if not authenticated
Register /admin route for AdminLogin and /admin/dashboard route wrapped with ProtectedRoute component

requirements.summary: Build Admin Dashboard UI with medicines manager, content editor, and overview panel
acceptanceCriteria: Sidebar navigation with: Overview, Medicines, Content Editor sections
Medicines section shows table of all medicines with Edit and Delete buttons
Add Medicine form with fields: name, description, price, category, availability
Content Editor shows text areas for each editable section with a Save button
Changes reflect on the public website after saving
Success/error toast notifications on all operations

file_operations.description: Create admin dashboard layout with sidebar navigation for Overview, Medicines, and Content Editor sections. Include logout button in header
Create overview panel displaying medicine count and quick stats fetched from backend using listMedicines(). Show summary cards with key metrics

Create medicines management page with table listing all medicines (fetch via listMedicines()), Add Medicine form with fields (name, description, price as number, category, available checkbox), Edit and Delete buttons per row. Call backend addMedicine(), editMedicine(), and deleteMedicine() functions. Show toast notifications on success/error

Create content editor page with text areas for editable sections (hero, about, services, announcements). Fetch current content using getAllContent() on load, save changes via updateContent(section, content). Show toast notifications on save
Register admin dashboard child routes: /admin/dashboard/overview, /admin/dashboard/medicines, /admin/dashboard/content under protected Dashboard component

requirements.summary: Add Services section on homepage showcasing hospital services with icons
acceptanceCriteria: Services section visible on the homepage
At least 6 service cards with icons and descriptions
Content pulled from backend content store
Visually consistent with site theme

file_operations.description: Create homepage with Hero component and Services section displaying at least 6 service cards (General Medicine, Emergency Care, Pharmacy, Diagnostics, Patient Consultation, etc.) with icons and descriptions. Fetch services content from backend using getContent('services'). Use generated hero banner image at frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-banner.dim_1440x600.png in Hero section
Register / route to render Home page component as the default landing page
